document.text:
From: "MMIIW 
To: "Strauss, Audrey (USANYS)" 
Subject: RE: Your outstanding work 
Date: Tue, 07 Jul 2020 16:32:59 +0000 
Really appreciate the kind words, thank you. And looking forward to the WebEx -- hopefully this afternoon! 
 Original Message 
From: Strauss, Audrey (USANYS) 
Sent: Monda Jul 06, 2020 
21:07 
To: 
Subject: Re: Your outstanding work 
I  think you did a spectacular job, first with Epstein, and now with Maxwell. And from what I could see, the 
teamwork was excellent. 
You have my thanks and admiration. 
Let's be sure to schedule the team Webex when you all have time to do it. 
Audrey 
Sent from my iPhone 
> On 
Jul 6, 2020, at 5:07 PM, wrote: 
> 
Audrey, 
> This is now belated -- I confess that even I took a couple days off this past weekend! -- but I wanted to say 
thank you for the kind words, and to express appreciation for your support of this investigation, not only in the 
initial Epstein prosecution but through the new angle on Maxwell and follow-up on other individuals as well. 
Everyone all the way up the chain has really cared about this the whole way through, and it was a team effort to 
work through the byzantine legal issues, the challenges with various witnesses, and all the other ancillary things 
that came up along the way. As one of the victim's counsel said to us recently, it has helped to right two wrongs -
- the initial wrong of what Epstein and Maxwell did, and the secondary wrong of how it was approached by the 
government the first time around. So, thank you again, and we're looking forward to the next stages. 
> 
Original 
Message 
> From: Strauss, Audrey (USANYS) 
aMINE> 
> Sent: Thursday, July 02, 2020 13:26 
> 
To: 
> Cc: 
> 
Subject: Your outstanding work 
> 
Team, 
> While I got to stand up and talk about the indictment, it was your dogged and ingenious work that made it 
possible for this office to bring this very worthy indictment. 
EFTA00015204

> We will still look for a time to have a Webex celebration of this milestone. 
> Enjoy the holiday 
weekend. 
> Audrey 
> 
> 
Sent from my iPhone 
EFTA00015205
